summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Millions of users at risk due to mis-issued certificates.
• Certificates were issued without proper domain validation.
• Cloudflare is scrambling to fix the issue ASAP.

Impact — Millions of users’ data hangs in the balance as Cloudflare rushes to clean up this mess.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2025/09/the-number-of-mis-issued-1-1-1-1-certificates-grows-heres-the-latest/
